description: Life tip: Look for adventure. But no matter where you go, no matter where you look, look good doing it. That’s where ‘Atlantis Rose’ comes in. The gloss frames are solid pink contrasted with a piano-black front face and temples for stellar style. The polarized lenses pop with a rosy personality that’s sure to complement your own. (Yea, flattery’s a talent of ours, we know.) Really though… you may not be the type to chase but, with these on, they’re probably gonna get caught up in you anyway.
name: Grove - Atlantis Rose, Black Frame, Pink Lens
